description.full: Rugby League Live brings all the hard hitting action and excitement of the greatest game of all to your lounge room.  Featuring: 40+ licensed teams from competitions such as the NRL, Super League, State of Origin, City v Country and International teams. 30+ realistic stadia from around the world. Bone crunching tackles. Field and uniform degradation.   Multiple replay angles and commentary by Andrew Voss. Xbox Live.
